content: this is a free low-sew crochet pattern based on a chicken difficulty beginner the pattern should be very straightforward and there are a few pieces to sew on you can sell or use this plushie as a gift but please do not distribute sell or claim the pattern as your own once you ve finished making the plushie be sure to post this on social media as long as you credit me instagram @ laurascraftedcollectibles good luck
